title: How do placements work on your second time around
body:
Quick Question: If you had a bad first time around in your first year of placements (late season 7). How will this affect your placement in the next season? I am 6-2 in my placements... much better than my 1-9 original placements but even if I went 10-0 in season 8 placements will  I even leave bronze... ???

P.S. Yes roast me I am bronze ahahahahha funny I big noob

replies.body: So when the new season starts, your new rank is mostly based off your placement matches but it *does* take your previous rank into account as well. I'm not 100% sure of exactly how it works, but the important thing to note is that your new rank is still mostly based on your placements.
